alert.note: Alert for Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, northeastern Taylor and southeastern Madison Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Perry, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Townsend, Buckville, Day, Chancey, Smith and Mayo Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
